mapper.content:
#  Hold Up!
<@{{5.author.id}}>

You **already** have a pending or verified wallet in our database.
No need to spam the command! 

> *Check the pinned message or ask for help if you are stuck.*

mapper.content:
#  QubicLink Verification
 Hello <@{{5.author.id}}!

To verify ownership of wallet:
`{{7.user_Wallet}}`

Please place a **BID ORDER** on QX (Asset: QUBIC) for exactly:
# `{{11.Signal_Code}}`

>  *This is a secure signal. You can cancel the order immediately after verification.*
